title: Northern Ireland housing bulletin
description: The Northern Ireland Housing Bulletin is a quarterly bulletin containing information on new housing starts and completions, homelessness, the NI House Price Index and new house sales and prices.
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified as latest version via link entitled "Northern Ireland housing bulletin [Quarter]" towards middle part of page under heading "Northern Ireland housing bulletins". This opens a new page with the spreadsheet located under the heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: This datatset seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the "Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin" dataset, see this dataset for details.
notes: This datatset seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the "Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin" dataset.
